about.title: About ISS JAPAN Co., LTD
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for Japanese automotive excellence. Quality used cars, tires, and auto parts worldwide.
about.historyDesc: Established automotive company specializing in used tires, used cars, and auto parts trading in domestic and international markets with official export license for Japanese national products.
about.valuesDesc: We believe in teamwork, multicultural expertise, and meeting every customer requirement with our experienced international staff.
about.missionDesc: We offer comprehensive services including Japanese auction car purchases, vehicle repairs, delivery services, and export/import solutions for cars, tires, and auto parts.

services.subtitle: We provide comprehensive automotive solutions tailored to meet your specific needs and requirements

footer.companyDesc: We specialize in high-quality automotive parts for over 10 years.

swiper.title: High Quality Tires & Wheels
swiper.subtitle: New and used tires with aluminum wheels at unbeatable prices. Trust Over Drive GOLD for all your automotive needs!

part1.name: Premium Used Tires
part1.description: Top quality used tires at affordable prices. Thoroughly inspected and tested for safety and performance. Great value for money!

part2.name: Aluminum Wheels
part2.description: Beautiful aluminum wheels in various designs and sizes. Perfect combination of style and performance for your vehicle.

part3.name: Auto Body Parts
part3.description: Wide range of auto body parts, tires, wheels, and spare parts. Professional inspection and repair services available.

part4.name: Professional Services
part4.description: Complete automotive services including technical inspection, repairs, and maintenance. Free evaluation! Commercial organizations welcome!

partners.subtitle: We collaborate with industry leaders to deliver exceptional automotive solutions worldwide.
